preference.name: DesignContextPLMXMLBuilder
preference.preference_description: Selects the BOMWriterPLMXMLBuilder class that should be used to construct the PLMXML for the DesignContext system. Use this if you need to use your own Parasolid PLMXML Toolkit extension library, or a different supplied builder.
